✅ NEW 95%/5% DISTRIBUTION WORKING: 6529 kWh autoconsumption (95.0%), 344 kWh surplus (5.0%). Monthly savings increased from 113.93€ to 139.07€ (+25.14€/month, +22.1%). Better balance with financing.
✅ NEW 3.25% TAEG RATE WORKING: 17840.0€ financed, 125.36€/month (vs 99.11€ simple division), 4724.10€ total interests (26.5% effective rate over 15 years) - REDUCED from old 4.96% rate
✅ ALL FINANCING OPTIONS WITH 3.25% TAEG WORKING: 10 options (6-15 years), payments range 273.06€ (6y) to 125.36€ (15y) - REDUCED from old 4.96% rate

✅ PDF generated successfully (169,235 bytes). Two financing tables: 'OPTIONS DE FINANCEMENT' (4.96% TAEG, 10 rows, 4 columns without total cost) and 'OPTIONS DE FINANCEMENT AVEC AIDES DÉDUITES' (3.25% TAEG, 10 rows, 4 columns without total cost). 15-year comparison: 180.61€ (4.96% TAEG) vs 125.36€ (3.25% TAEG) = 55.25€/month savings.
